name: Synth Slider
description:
Features:

-Sliding.

-Flying.

-Framerate issues (not really a feature, but yknow).

-Other bugs.

Controls:

Left arrow to move left. Right arrow to move right. (complex stuff, i know)

When you come across this orange portal looking thing it will make you fly, so you wont fall.

Press up arrow to begin.

Music - Mainspring by Waterflame

The game isnt finished (if you couldnt tell).
